mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select ROWNUM as recNum, lvl, qna_no, qnaparent_no, qna_title, member_id, qna_pw, qna_date from (select LEVEL as lvl, qna_no, qnaparent_no, qna_title, member_id, qna_pw, qna_date from board_qna START WITH qnaparent_no=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR qna_no = qnaparent_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY qna_no DESC) ) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_qna(qna_no, qnaparent_no, member_id, qna_title, qna_content, qna_pw, qna_policy) VALUES(#{qna_no}, #{qnaparent_no}, #{member_id}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qna_policy})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_qna WHERE qna_no IN ( SELECT qna_no FROM board_qna START WITH qna_no = #{qna_no} CONNECT BY PRIOR qna_no = qnaparent_no )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_qna WHERE qna_no=#{qna_no} AND qna_pw=#{qna_pw}
